/usr/bin/cc  -fPIC    -w -w -g -Wl,--fatal-warnings -Wl,--no-undefined -lc    -shared -Wl,-soname,libvtkgl2ps-6.2.so.1 -o /home/snr/Support/Plus-build-codeblocks/bin/libvtkgl2ps-6.2.so.1 CMakeFiles/vtkgl2ps.dir/gl2ps.c.o -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lm /home/snr/Support/Plus-build-codeblocks/bin/libvtkzlib-6.2.so.1 /home/snr/Support/Plus-build-codeblocks/bin/libvtkpng-6.2.so.1 -lm /home/snr/Support/Plus-build-codeblocks/bin/libvtkzlib-6.2.so.1 -lm -Wl,-rpath,/home/snr/Support/Plus-build-codeblocks/bin:
